resourceTemplates.name: supadata-transcript
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata transcript
resourceTemplates.description: Get transcript from a supported platform or file URL. If too large, the API returns a jobId. Use supadata-transcript-job for results.

resourceTemplates.name: supadata-transcript-job
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata transcript job
resourceTemplates.description: Get results for a transcript job by jobId.

resourceTemplates.name: supadata-metadata
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata metadata
resourceTemplates.description: Fetch unified media metadata for supported platforms.
